exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params xs : list packet p : packet ys : list packet net : network st' : name -> raft_data ps' : list packet d : raft_data m : msg t : nat cid : name lli, llt : nat H : handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) H0 : pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt H1 : append_entries_request_reply_correspondence net H2 : raft_intermediate_reachable net H3 : nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys H4 : forall h : name, st' h = update (nwState net) (pDst p) d h H5 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \\/ p' = {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := pSrc p; pBody := m |} Unable to unify "append_entries_request_reply_correspondence net" with "append_entries_request_reply_correspondence {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}".

original: unfold raft_net_invariant_request_vote, raft_net_invariant_request_vote. simpl. intros. eapply H1; eauto.
